verses.verse: Yahweh <WH3068> says <WH5002> to my Lord, <WH3068> "Sit <WH3427> at my right hand, <WH3225> until I make <WH7896> your enemies <WH341> your footstool for your feet. <WH1916>"
Yahweh <WH3068> will send <WH7971> forth the rod <WH4294> of your strength <WH5797> out of Zion. <WH6726> Rule <WH7287> in the midst <WH7130> of your enemies. <WH341>

Your people <WH5971> offer themselves willingly <WH5071> in the day <WH3117> of your power, <WH2428> in holy <WH6944> array. <WH1926> Out of the womb <WH7358> of the morning, <WH4891> you have the dew <WH2919> of your youth. <WH3208>
Yahweh <WH3068> has sworn, <WH7650> and will not change <WH5162> his mind: <WH3548> "You are a priest forever <WH5769> in the order <WH1700> of Melchizedek. <WH4442>"
The Lord <WH136> is at your right hand. <WH3225> He will crush <WH4272> kings <WH4428> in the day <WH3117> of his wrath. <WH639>
He will judge <WH1777> among the nations. <WH1471> He will heap <WH4390> up dead bodies. <WH1472> He will crush <WH4272> the ruler <WH7218> of the whole <WH7227> earth. <WH776>
He will drink <WH8354> of the brook <WH5158> in the way; <WH1870> therefore he will lift up <WH7311> his head. <WH7218>
